Description.Name: Basic Attack: Star Track Combo
Dodge: Shadow Trail
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Refraction
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Stardust Echo
Special Attack: Death Concerto - Storm
EX Special Attack: Reaper's Concerto - Daybreak
EX Special Attack: Reaper's Concerto - Daybreak
Chain Attack: Brilliant Theater
Ultimate: Charge, Mega Armor!
Quick Assist: Mist Strike
Defensive Assist: Voice of Illusions
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Dreamweaver's Harmony

Name: Core Passive: Night's Exaltation
Additional Ability: Poem of the Long Night
Desc:
Upon entering the battlefield, Lucia immediately gains 60 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color>. When activating <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>, if Lucia's <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> reaches 100, she enters <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color> and activates <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color>. While <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color> is active, all squad members' max HP increases by 5% for 30 seconds. Repeated triggers extend the duration, up to 300 seconds.

While Lucia is in <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color>, activating any <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> consumes 25 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> to upgrade <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> to <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>.

When in the background, if the active character's attack hits an enemy, Lucia consumes 25 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>. The <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color> becomes a <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>. After triggering a skill upgrade or <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color> cannot be triggered again for 6 seconds.

When Lucia triggers a skill upgrade or <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>, all squad members gain <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Lullaby]</color> status. Under <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Lullaby]</color> status, characters deal <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> more DMG for 8 seconds. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

Lucia exits <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color> when <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> is insufficient or when leaving <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>.

Triggered when there is a <color=#FFFFFF>[Rupture]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Stun]</color> character in the squad:
When applying <color=#FFFFFF>[Dark Break]</color> status, additionally increases CRIT DMG by 30%.

Name: Core Passive: Night's Exaltation
Additional Ability: Poem of the Long Night
Desc:
When entering the battlefield, Lucia immediately gains 60 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color>. If Lucia's <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> reaches 100 points when activating <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>, she enters <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color> and simultaneously activates <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color>. While <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color> is active, all squad members' max HP increases by 5%, lasting 30 seconds. Repeated triggers extend the duration, up to 300 seconds.

While Lucia is in <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color>, activating any <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> consumes 25 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> points to upgrade <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> to <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>.

When in the background, if the active character's attacks hit enemies, Lucia consumes 25 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> points to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>. The <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color> becomes a <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>. After triggering a skill upgrade or <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color> cannot be triggered again for 6 seconds.

When Lucia triggers a skill upgrade or <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>, all squad members gain <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Rhyme]</color> status. Under <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Rhyme]</color> status, characters' DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> for 8 seconds. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

Lucia exits <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color> when <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Value]</color> is insufficient or when leaving <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>.

Triggered when there is a <color=#FFFFFF>[Rupture]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Stun]</color> character in the squad:
When applying <color=#FFFFFF>[Dark Break]</color> status, additionally increases CRIT DMG by 30%.

Name: Core Passive: Night's Exaltation
Additional Ability: Poem of the Long Night
Desc:
When entering the battlefield, Lucia immediately gains 60 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Points]</color>. If Lucia's <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Points]</color> reach 100 when triggering <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>, she enters <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color> and activates <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color>. While <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color> is active, all squad members' max HP increases by 5% for 30 seconds. Repeated triggers extend the duration, up to 300 seconds.

While Lucia is in <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color>, using any <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> consumes 25 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Points]</color> to upgrade <color=#FFFFFF>[Reverie]</color> to <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>.

When off-field, if the active character's attacks hit enemies, Lucia consumes 25 <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Points]</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>. This <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color> is a <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color>. After triggering a skill upgrade or <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color> cannot be triggered again for 6 seconds.

When Lucia triggers a skill upgrade or <color=#FFFFFF>[Aftershock]</color>, all squad members gain <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Lullaby]</color> status. Under <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Lullaby]</color> status, characters deal <color=#2BAD00>18.3%</color> more DMG for 8 seconds. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

Lucia exits <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream State]</color> when <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Points]</color> are insufficient or when leaving <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>.

Triggered when there is a <color=#FFFFFF>[Rupture]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Stun]</color> character in the squad:
When applying <color=#FFFFFF>[Dark Break]</color> status, additionally increases CRIT DMG by 30%.

Name: Core Passive: Night's Exaltation
Additional Ability: Poem of the Long Night
Desc:
Triggered when there is a <color=#FFFFFF>[Rupture]</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>[Stun]</color> character in the squad:
When applying <color=#FFFFFF>[Dark Break]</color> status, additionally increases CRIT DMG by 30%.

1.Name: Secret Friend
1.Desc: While under <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Patrol Nursery Rhyme]</color> status, additional DMG dealt ignores 12% of enemy's All-Attribute RES and increases Decibel Generation Rate by 8%; additionally, when Lucia upgrades her skills, she gains 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>[Echo]</color>, stacking up to 4 times. When <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Patrol Nursery Rhyme]</color> status ends, if Lucia has <color=#FFFFFF>[Echo]</color>, it will automatically consume 1 stack and reapply <color=#FFFFFF>[Dream Patrol Nursery Rhyme]</color> status to all squad members.

2.Name: Master of Magic
2.Desc: While Lucia is within <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color> deals 15% increased DMG; Agents with <color=#FFFFFF>[Dark Break]</color> status within <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil: Gushing Spring]</color> gain an additional 15% Sheer DMG bonus.

4.Name: Late Night
4.Desc: When <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color> is activated or extended on the field, Lucia grants 120 Decibels to all squad members. This effect can trigger once every 15 seconds.

6.Name: The Never-ending Journey
6.Desc: While Lucia is within any <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>, her ATK is increased by 2% of her initial max HP; <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color> will always CRIT, and when <color=#FFFFFF>[Chorus]</color> scores a CRIT, CRIT DMG is increased by 30%.
